kaninator.graphics
Class Screen

java.lang.Object
  kaninator.graphics.Screen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Canvas
public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
implements Canvas

Implements the Canvas interface with the Java2D library. Takes a number of VisibleElement objects and draws them to the screen with the Java2D API. Also responsible for creating and initializing the window.

Author:
phedman
See Also:
Canvas, VisibleElement, JFrame
